Discover Our Collection


Explore our diverse range of handcrafted crochet items, from cozy pullovers and elegant shawls to charming amigurumi and personalized gifts. Each piece is made with the finest materials and meticulous attention to detail,ensuring that every item is as special as the person who receives it.

Mesh Shrug

MWK14,000

Our mesh shrugs are designed to add a little extra spice to your outfits. All while being cute, the yarn provides warmth. Colour & size customizable.

Hexagon Pullover

MWK30,000

Our hexagon pullover is both warm and stylish. The three different colours allow it to be compatible with the rest of your outfit. Colour & size customizable.

Granny Square Handbag

MWK15,500

This handbag is crocheted but screams CHIC. The strap is thick and strong, it also has a lining to prevent stretching. It's the perfect bag for all your small necessities. Colour & size customizable.

Ruffle Top

MWK13,500

Ruffle up! Add some character to your outfit with this ruffle top. This corset-like top has straps to secure you as you go about your day. Colour & size customizable.

Cat Beanie

MWK12,000

Calling all cat lovers, this beanie is purrrfect for when it's cold and also when you want to stand out due to its unique structure. Colour & size customizable.

Runched Mesh Top

MWK13,000

The runched mesh top is perfect for summertime. The mesh holes and straps arrangement make it breathable and stylish. The whole outfit is complemented with a bow to show how cutesy it is! Colour and size customizable.

Seashell Lace Top

MWK11,000

The seashell lace top features delicate shell patterns,scalloped edges and airy openwork, offering a breezy, feminine style perfect for summer or seaside wear.Colour and size customizable.
